subject: Seeking Additional Performance Security for the Bidders who have quoted abnormally Low Bid Price-reg.
text: #Ray 7754 WTHNf qferasrut (Tsw5 4Rdev &r TTHrf TT4, YRG TTGFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Trua va 7f1-5 Qa' 6, Tarr-10, E1WT, #f forft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 (Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Standard Documents/2025 Policy Circular No. 11.67/ 2025 dated 19th 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/EPC/2020 (Comp. No. 46753)} Sub: Seeking Additional Performance Security for the Bidders who have quoted abnormally Low Bid Price-reg: MoRTH vide Circular No NH 37015/01/2022 (Comp No.208778) dated 26.08.2022 issued Guidelines for seeking Additional Performance Security: The same were circulated by NHAI vide Policy Circular No. 11.42/2022 dated 13.09.2022. 2 Now MoRTH vide Policy Circular No. RWINH-33044/34/2024-S&r (P&B) (Comp. No_ 246283) dated 30.04.2025 has  issued the revised   Guidelines in respect  of Additional Performance Security. A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and implementation at Annexure-1_ 3 The requisite modification in Standard RFP and Agreement of EPC Projects is also enclosed at Annexure-2_ 4 This issue with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above. (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) Ic Chief General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1, Hindi Division for translation in Hindi: 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation. 91 ? T 9 NHAL T9 , May, Tloskas Copy
